description.part1:
I am a versatile software developer with 3 years of
experience, currently based in Gdańsk, originally from
Jelenia Góra in Lower Silesia. My expertise spans multiple
layers of the technology stack, with particular
proficiency in the Vue framework.
description.part2:
Throughout my career,
I have not only developed projects but also actively
participated in their deployment, giving me a
comprehensive understanding of the software lifecycle
from conception to production.
description.title: Software Developer
